name: B. Before an Exam
statement:
Tomorrow Peter has a Biology exam. He does not like this subject much,
but days ago he learnt that he would have to take this exam. Peter’s
strict parents made him prepare for the exam immediately, for this
purpose he has to study not less than and not more than hours per each
-th day. Moreover, they warned Peter that a day before the exam they
would check how he has followed their instructions.So, today is the day
when Peter’s parents ask him to show the timetable of his preparatory
studies. But the boy has counted only the sum of hours spent him on
preparation, and now he wants to know if he can show his parents a
timetable with numbers, where each number stands for the time in hours
spent by Peter each -th day on biology studies, and satisfying the
limitations imposed by his parents, and at the same time the sum total
of all should equal to .
